title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 449 - Supervised Independent Living Programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 449 - Supervised Independent Living Programs

State Regulations
§ 449.1 - Definitions
§ 449.2 - Conditions for application and approval of a supervised setting program
§ 449.3 - Conditions for operation of a supervised setting program by an authorized agency
§ 449.4 - Requirements for each supervised setting
§ 449.5 - Notification of municipality
§ 449.6 - Required documentation
§ 449.7 - Waivers
§ 449.8 - Discontinuance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 449

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f], 374- b, 462[1][a]; L. 1997, ch. 436

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
